Set.Text: Unleash nuclear destruction upon your foes. Does great damage to Cities and damages any Unit caught in the blast radius. Cannot be destroyed by nuclear attacks.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Manhattan Project.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires access to [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION] Production 15% faster in cities with Nuclear Plant.

The Nuclear Missile is an upgraded, more powerful Atomic Bomb. The Nuclear Missile can be based in any city you own or aboard a Nuclear Submarine or Missile Cruiser. It can move from base to base or attack a target anywhere on the map. When it detonates, a Nuclear Missile will damage cities and destroy all units within its blast radius of 2 tiles. It is automatically destroyed when it attacks. See the rules on Nuclear Weapons for more details.
